name: Burning Low
description:
Platformer made for the Ludum Dare 39 (theme is "running out of power"). The player must complete the game without his energy running out, and every little thing they do spend some of their resources.

Art and music by Hiago Souza (Geminimax)

Code and development by Guilherme Torres (Jegus9)

Made with the Godot Engine.
